name: Click Critters - Theme & Font Changer
description: A way to use the Click Critters website with the background color and font size you want by editing within the style.
additional_info: Meant to be used with the Soulkeeper Event layout, but if you figure out which attributes you want to change, you can easily use the others and have it look good. Built off of Nayelianne's previous style, found here.
